title: Educated by the Alien: Jaime
description: Book 2 in the Azurite Series...One wrong turn could cause your death. Or save your life in more ways than one.Mallory is ready to start fresh from the series of mistakes she's made in her life. She's found herself without a boyfriend, without a job, and forced into moving back with her parents without any money. First contact with the Azurite race is giving her the chance of a lifetime to live aboard their ship as a part of the first ever Earth colony and start over fresh. She didn't think she had anything to lose...Jaime wants what his best friends a best friend, a lover, a partner. After a failed pairing with another Azurite, Jaime has no hope for a future relationship. Just as he resigns himself to a life alone, along comes a damsel in distress--Mallory.When outside forces threaten to break them apart, will they give up the possibility of a future and love, or sacrifice their love for each other? They will both face difficult decisions as Mallory is educated by the alien.Standalone, HEA.This book contains adult content including hot aliens and steamy sex.For mature audiences 18 and older.
author: Sara Hotchkiss
